name: Friendshape
description:
Friendshape is a 2D, co-op, puzzle platformer. You can play it with the keyboard using WASD and the arrow keys or with an xbox 360 controller using the analog sticks and 'A' to jump.

Press 'R' or 'start' to restart a level. Press 'esc' or 'select' to go back.

Collaborators:

  • Kyle Johnston - Music and Sound
  • Tanner Rogalsky - Code
  • Ryan Wang - Art
